item.title: EraseInstall application retired
item.description: It makes me very sad that the [**EraseInstall application**](https://bitbucket.org/prowarehouse-nl/erase-install/) has been retired.

item.title: Off-boarding in a Modern Deployment | JNUC 2019
item.description: Imaging is dead. Secure Boot and the T2 system controller have changed the toolset available to Mac administrators. The new post-imaging world of Mojave requires new workflows.
